history.heading: Equipment capable of fabricating copper metal interconnects in a vacuum environment that deposits all of the following:
history.title: Equipment capable of fabricating copper metal interconnects in a vacuum environment that deposits all of the following:

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774 - The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: 3B090 Semiconductor manufacturing equipment, not Controlled by 3B001, as follows (see List of Items Controlled) and “specially designed” “parts,” “components,” and “accessories” therefor.
Semiconductor manufacturing deposition equipment, as follows:
history.text:
Equipment capable of fabricating copper metal interconnects in a vacuum environment that deposits all of the following:
A cobalt or ruthenium layer using organometallic compound where the process pressure is 1-100 Torr, and the wafer substrate temperature is maintained between 20 °C and 500 °C; and
a.9.a. A cobalt or ruthenium layer using organometallic compound where the process pressure is 1-100 Torr, and the wafer substrate temperature is maintained between 20 °C and 500 °C; and
A copper layer using a physical vapor deposition technique where the process pressure is 1-100m Torr and the wafer substrate temperature is maintained below 500 °C.
a.9.b. A copper layer using a physical vapor deposition technique where the process pressure is 1-100m Torr and the wafer substrate temperature is maintained below 500 °C.
